fullText: Cole Escola's deliriously funny and deeply unhinged comedy 'Oh, Mary!' is a raucous reimagining of Mary Todd Lincoln as a boozy, foul-mouthed aspiring cabaret star.
dtliExcerpt: Cole Escola's deliriously funny and deeply unhinged comedy 'Oh, Mary!' is a raucous reimagining of Mary Todd Lincoln as a boozy, foul-mouthed aspiring cabaret star.
